name: Y &Y Plasfun Belay Glasses - Unisex
description: Climb frequently enough and you'll probably experience belay neck. When that pain gets to be too much to bear, these glasses let you safely track your partner's "take-climbing-take" sequence without feeling like you're watching a movie from the front row.High transparency prisms provide excellent optical performance and a natural line of sight.Light, solid plastic frames survive the occasional dynamic belay.Large and stable nose pads for comfort on long, long belays.Adjustable arms accommodate a wide range of head shapes.Rigid zippered case included.
